did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: This photograph is of an unidentified woman taken at an undetermined date.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Photograph of Unidentified Woman must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Photograph of Unidentified Woman, Ms2009-117, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Photograph of Unidentified Woman was purchased by Special Collections.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Photograph of Unidentified Woman commenced and was completed in August 2009.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: There is no biographical information available.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Although this photograph is unmarked, the woman's clothing would suggest that it was taken during the Victorian era (1837-1901) or the following era–the Edwardian era (1901-1910). In the photograph, the woman is holding a scroll; this scroll could, perhaps, be indicative of the woman's educational achievements.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type.
